Dear John:
Take my vote for the "Window on the World.”
I haven't done any voting because I wasn't
to do any this year, but I'm going to put in a vote for this
anyhow.
Did you get my publicity for "The Valiant”
series? You have the tapes.
Cordially yours.
Wa I do Abbot
Director of Broadcasting
